blogPost.excerpt: warpAR is a free augmented reality app for iOS that lets you distort the textures of the real world. Tap and drag to reshape buildings or turn murals into swirls of color using a set of liquify tools.
blogPost.body: warpAR is a free augmented reality app for iOS that lets you distort the textures of the real world. Tap and drag to reshape buildings or turn murals into swirls of color using a set of liquify tools.
blogPost.title: warpAR - Distort real world textures using augmented reality
blogPost.author: Matt Bierner

localize.description: warpAR是一款iOS上的免费增强现实应用，让你可以扭曲现实世界的纹理。点击并拖动来重塑建筑物，或使用一组液化工具将壁画变成颜色的漩涡。
localize.tagline: 利用增强现实技术扭曲现实世界的纹理

localize.description: warpAR是一款iOS上的免費增強現實應用，讓你可以扭曲現實世界的紋理。點擊並拖動來重塑建築物，或使用一組液化工具將壁畫變成顏色的漩渦。
localize.tagline: 利用增強現實技術扭曲現實世界的紋理

previous.excerpt: Powerful mockup generator that lets you seamlessly mix and match different hand models with devices and backgrounds. Works on the macOS, Windows and Linux. Also available as a https://www.figma.com/c/plugin/786250770157843670/Mockuuups-Studio.
previous.title: Mockuuups Studio 3.0 - Mockup generator with diverse hands & endless possibilities

localize.description: 强大的模拟生成器，让你可以将不同的手部模型与设备和背景进行无缝混合和匹配。适用于macOS，Windows和Linux。也可作为https://www.figma.com/c/plugin/786250770157843670/Mockuuups-Studio。
localize.tagline: Mockup生成器具有多种手感和无限的可能性。

localize.description: 強大的模擬生成器，讓你可以將不同的手部模型與設備和背景進行無縫混合和匹配。適用於macOS，Windows和Linux。也可作爲https://www.figma.com/c/plugin/786250770157843670/Mockuuups-Studio。
localize.tagline: Mockup生成器具有多種手感和無限的可能性。

next.excerpt: Animate your layers and present your art in a whole new dimension! ✨ Float transforms static and flat artworks into moving creations. Your masterpieces deserve to be shown in the most fun and engaging way.
next.title: Float - Bring your art to life

localize.description: 为您的图层注入活力，以全新的维度呈现您的艺术作品! ✨ Float将静态和平面的艺术作品转化为移动的作品。您的杰作应该以最有趣、最吸引人的方式展示。
爲您的圖層注入活力，以全新的維度呈現您的藝術作品! ✨ Float將靜態和平面的藝術作品轉化爲移動的作品。您的傑作應該以最有趣、最吸引人的方式展示。
